main event: On July 7, 1968, a witness in Medford, Oregon observed a large orange object that traveled north before disappearing.
interesting points: The object was described as a large craft with wings and lights under the wings,The sighting duration was approximately 10-15 seconds,The object was reported to be very high but large in size, The report contains conflicting data and no physical evidence was provided, Witness Howard Dana Gallo was 40 years old at the time of the sighting.
sighted object: large orange object in the sky
witness description: Howard Dana Gallo, 40 years old, male
